GRRLIB_Font Struct Reference

#include <GRRLIB.h>

Data Fields

FT_Face face
FT_Bool kerning

Detailed Description

Structure to hold the TTF information.

Field Documentation

FT_Face face

A TTF face object.

FT_Bool kerning

true whenever a face object contains kerning data that can be accessed with FT_Get_Kerning.
